file_content.text: Is that the Senator? I--I'll let my lieutenant know. Thanks, Captain.
Are you back from the museum already? Master Sumalee said it would take longer than that.
Go right in. Master Sumalee is expecting you.
Then I must dig, to reopen the old routes.
I draw the line at manual labor.
I don't dig.
I will dig. You watch for Imperials.
And I... stand around looking intimidating? Do I look intimidating?
And what do I do?
Only to potential in-laws.
You may need to work on that.
If you want, you can borrow Sergeant Boom. He makes anyone look intimidating....
I'll help.
No.
Maybe Akaavi will let you borrow the helmet....
You defend Curske. If you can do it with a look, all the better.
Are you ready now, or do you need to get some clothes on?
Let's go.
Master Sumalee will show you points to set the charges. Then meet me at the entrance. I'll lead you through.
And I'll keep the generals from ordering an orbital strike on the museum.
No trespassing.
